title: Rashi on Esther
text: it was the days of achashverosh... the king of persia after cyrus towards the end of the seventy years of the babylonian exile
Took 3 years to solidify his rule. Chazal have their Midrash.
Showing off how many cups he has
He remembered Vashti: That is, her beauty. And he was sad. [Because of this.]
Garments of Royalty. Our Rabbi's have said that Ruach Hakodesh clothed her, as it says, "And the Spirit clothed Amasi
He strengthened to stand in his anger because he was afraid to take revenge without permission
